messages.subject: leaves and grass clippings - Mmmmm
messages.msgSnippet: ... I have one of those old-timey rotary mowers! I love it. :o) We always leave the grass clippings on the lawn. As for the leaves, well I live in the
messages.messageBody:
>>Unless you have one of those old-timey rotary mowers, like someone I
>>know.>>

I have one of those old-timey rotary mowers! I love it. :o) We always leave
the grass clippings on the lawn. As for the leaves, well I live in the
mountains and it's pretty windy up here. Most times they just blow away. I
*do* wonder where they ultimately end up though? Is here some HUGE leaf pile
somewhere east of me? Maybe Colorado. ;-)

Life is good.
~Mary
